titleInfo.title: Football and Marching Band Appreciation Banquet, 1947

mods.abstract: In 1947, the "C" Club honored the football teams and the marching band with a fine banquet at the Memphis Town Club. The guest of honor was Harry Stuhldreher, one of the "Four Horsemen" of Notre Dame and then-head coach at the University of Wisconsin.
